Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I posted about this before the forum disaster, so here it is again.

I've got an extremely small Youtube channel and at the moment I'm uploading a KSP series.

Here's the channel: www.youtube.com/TheDaemonicGamer

Or if you're lazy (don't look at me like that Internet, I know what you're like) here's a link to the first episode in the KSP series:

I'm slowly starting to branch out to other games, for now that's mainly World of Tanks.

Any likes, comments and subscriptions are greatly appreciated and I hope you all enjoy the videos.

Jake.
